在 [@projectName](project) / [@appName](app) 中, 对 [@serviceName] runtime 进行部署操作
应用 [@appName](app) 中, 对 [@serviceName] 进行了扩缩容, [@scaleMessageZH]
success.en: in app [@appName](app), changed the scale of service [@serviceName], [@scaleMessageEN]

success.zh: 在 [@projectName](project) 项目中，对测试计划 [@testPlanName] 进行了归档
在 [@projectName](project) 项目中，对测试计划 [@testPlanName] 取消了归档
在 [@projectName](project) 项目中，对<<issueType>>事项追加了状态 [@stateName]
success.en: Add issue state [@stateName] for <<issueType>> in project [@projectName](project)

success.zh: 在 [@projectName](project) 项目中，对<<issueType>>事项更新了状态 [@stateName]
success.en: Update issue state [@stateName] for <<issueType>> in project [@projectName](project)

success.zh: 在 [@projectName](project) 项目中，对<<issueType>>事项删除了状态 [@stateName]
success.en: Delete issue state [@stateName] for <<issueType>> in project [@projectName](project)

updateProjectResourceConfig.desc: 修改项目环境资源配置

success.zh:
在组织 [@orgName] 中，修改了项目 [@projectName](project) 的资源配置。
开发环境 修改前：集群：[@oldDevCluster]，CPU：[@oldDevCPU] 核，内存：[@oldDevMem]；修改后：集群：[@newDevCluster]，CPU：[@newDevCPU] 核，内存：[@newDevMem]
测试环境 修改前：集群：[@oldTestCluster]，CPU：[@oldTestCPU] 核，内存：[@oldTestMem]；修改后：集群：[@newTestCluster]，CPU：[@newTestCPU] 核，内存：[@newTestMem]
预发环境 修改前：集群：[@oldStagingCluster]，CPU：[@oldStagingCPU] 核，内存：[@oldStagingMem]；修改后：集群：[@newStagingCluster]，CPU：[@newStagingCPU] 核，内存：[@newStagingMem]
生产环境 修改前：集群：[@oldProdCluster]，CPU：[@oldProdCPU] 核，内存：[@oldProdMem]；修改后：集群：[@newProdCluster]，CPU：[@newProdCPU] 核，内存：[@newProdMem]
success.en:
Update resource config for project [@projectName](project) in organization [@orgName].
Workspace dev Before: Cluster: [@oldDevCluster], CPU: [@oldDevCPU] core(s), memory: [@oldDevMem]; Now: Cluster: [@newDevCluster], CPU: [@newDevCPU] core(s), memory: [@newDevMem]
Workspace test Before: Cluster: [@oldTestCluster], CPU: [@oldTestCPU] core(s), memory: [@oldTestMem]; Now: Cluster: [@newTestCluster], CPU: [@newTestCPU] core(s), memory: [@newTestMem]
Workspace staging Before: Cluster: [@oldStagingCluster], CPU: [@oldStagingCPU] core(s), memory: [@oldStagingMem]; Now: Cluster: [@newStagingCluster], CPU: [@newStagingCPU] core(s), memory: [@newStagingMem]
Workspace production Before: Cluster: [@oldProdCluster], CPU: [@oldProdCPU], memory: [@oldProdMem]; Now: Cluster: [@newProdCluster], CPU: [@newProdCPU], memory: [@newProdMem]

createMySQLAddonAccount.desc: 创建 MySQL Addon 账号

success.zh: 在 [@projectName](project) 项目中，对 [@workspace] 环境的 [MySQL](addonPlatformMysqlAccount) 创建了账号 [@mysqlUsername]
success.en: Create account [@mysqlUsername] for [MySQL](addonPlatformMysqlAccount) at [@workspace] in project [@projectName](project)

deleteMySQLAddonAccount.desc: 删除 MySQL Addon 账号

success.zh: 在 [@projectName](project) 项目中，对 [@workspace] 环境的 [MySQL](addonPlatformMysqlAccount) 删除了账号 [@mysqlUsername]
success.en: Delete account [@mysqUsername] for [MySQL](addonPlatformMysqlAccount) at [@workspace] in project [@projectName](project)

resetAttachmentMySQLAddonAccount.desc: 修改 MySQL Addon 账号引用

success.zh: 在 [@projectName](project) / [@appName](app) 中, 对 runtime [@runtimeName](runtimeDetailRoot) 修改了 MySQL 账号 [@preMysqlUsername] -> [@mysqlUsername]
success.en: Change MySQL account [@preMysqlUsername] -> [@mysqlUsername] for runtime [@runtimeName](runtimeDetailRoot) in [@projectName](project) / [@appName](app)

success.zh: 在 [@projectName](project) 项目中， 更新了测试空间 [@spaceName] 的[@field], 由 [@from] 变成 [@to]
